item.title: Bakery Creates Cakes With Poppable Pimples
item.description: Bakery Creates Cakes With Poppable Pimples, And It's All Too RealBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Oct. 29 2018, 10:03 a.m. ET Source: facebookThere's a huge demographic of people who quietly suffer with a gross obsession: and that's pimple popping. Don't believe me? Look, the fact that there's a YouTube account called Dr. Pimple Popper that has tens of millions of views should be indication enough of our society's gross obsession with puss.

item.title: MTN, GLO, Others Leave Subscribers Stranded After Blocking Lines Over NIN Linkage
item.description: Subscribers on mobile lines not linked with the National Identification Number (NIN) across the country have been barred from making outgoing calls by the association of Licensed Telecommunication Operators of Nigeria (ALTON) following the order by the Nigerian government. Naija News reports that ALTON Chairman, Gbenga Adebayo, and head of operations, Gbolahan Awonuga, had earlier announced their resolve to comply with the order. According to him, members of the association are committed to supporting Buhari’s regime and upholding the rights of citizens to communicate.

item.title: Nollywood Actress Speaks On Difficulty In Finding A Good Man
item.description: Fast-rising Nollywood actress, Peju Johnson, has said that she is looking forward to getting married and having kids. Naija News reports that Peju, in an interview with The Punch, lamented the difficulty in finding a good man and the increase in marriage crashes. Notwithstanding, the movie star said she is optimistic that there is still a man out there for her. She said, “I cannot stay without getting married. I want to be married.

item.title: Get the Hunting Rifle in 'Fortnite' Before It's Vaulted Again
item.description: The Hunting Rifle has been brought back to 'Fortnite' after being locked in the vault for some time. Here are details on its stats and where to find it. Source: Epic Games via @DefaultsBR on TwitterAs the war between the IO soldiers and the Resistance continues in Fortnite, Epic Games has continued to unvault new weapons to help players in their battles against the enemies. In the past, the game reintroduced previous favorites, like the Light Machine Gun and the Heavy Sniper Rifle.

item.title: Lili Taylor Now: The Actress Brought Carolyn Perron to Life in 'The Conjuring'
item.description: If you're a fan of 'The Conjuring,' you'll know the movie was based on real life events. So what's the actress who played Carolyn Perron doing now? Source: Warner Bros."Based on a true story," or "inspired by real events," are Hollywood tropes that seem to sell movies — especially when it comes to the horror genre. It seems like producers are always shy to pull the trigger on projects that are completely original concepts.

item.title: Mike De Force - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Husband of internet personality Fleur De Force who stars alongside his wife on the web series Food With Fleur & Mike on the Sainsbury's Food channel. He has over 30,000 followers on Twitter.  Before Fame He and Fleur met at a house party of a friend. He works for his family's car dealership. Trivia He became engaged to Fleur on June 26, 2012 and they married August 24, 2013. Family Life He has a twin sister named Clare and another sister named Lizzie.

item.title: Peter Obi Sends Message To Nigerian Youths Ahead Of 2023 Elections
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, has advised Nigerian youths to vote for qualified, competent, and trustworthy candidates at the federal and state levels during the 2023 general elections. Naija News reports that the former Governor of Anambra State gave the advice on Saturday while addressing a press conference in Abakaliki, the Ebonyi State capital. He asked Nigerians, especially the youths, to see the 2023 elections as an opportunity to take back their country and more importantly shun every form of primordial sentiments.

item.title: What's 'American Pie's Alyson Hannigan up to These Days? Read to Find Out!
item.description: What happened to 'American Pie' and 'How I Met Your Mother' star Alyson Hannigan? Here's everything we know about her husband and kids! Source: Getty ImagesAlyson Hannigan Thanks to her breakout role as Michelle in the cult comedy film franchise American Pie, actress Alyson Hannigan took over the early to mid-2000s. Her appearances in popular series like Buffy the Vampire Slayer and How I Met Your Mother pretty much cemented her place in pop culture history.

item.title: 'Mystery' Man Behind Suit Against Atiku, PDP, Tambuwal Revealed
item.description: A former presidential aspirant on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Dr. Cosmos Ndukwe, has claimed that he is behind the suit challenging the presidential candidate of the party, former Vice President Atiku Abubakar, and not the governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike. Controversial Case And Denial Naija News had earlier reported that a suit marked FHC/ABJ/CS/782/2022, allegedly instituted by Wike and one Newgent Ekamon, had been filed against the PDP presidential candidate; Sokoto State Governor Aminu Tambuwal; and the PDP over the conduct of the presidential primary of the party which was held in Abuja on May 28 and May 29, 2022.

item.title: Analysis: Ruto-Oparanya ticket on the cards, could trigger political fallout in Mt Kenya
item.description: The two have been frequently meeting amid reports that Ruto is keen on handing running mate position to OparanyaPolitical pundits say the DP feels fully assured of Mt Kenya support and is focused on gaining support elsewherePolitical analyst Herman Manyora says getting a partner from Western at Mt Kenya’s expense will be suicidal for RutoHe says the DP needs Mt Kenya more than he needs any other region, and a slight miscalculation will prove costlyOparanya has declared interest in the presidency, but it’s unlikely he will land a running mate slot in Raila Odinga’s camp.

item.title: Mackenzie Foy - Age, Family, Bio
Moses Simon Apologizes For Super Eagles' Run In 2026 World Cup Qualifiers
item.description: Nantes Football Club winger, Moses Simon has apologized to Nigerians over Super Eagles’ woeful performance in their first two 2026 World Cup qualifiers. Moses Simon was the Super Eagles’s assistant captain in the World Cup qualifiers against Lesotho and Zimbabwe. Unfortunately, Simon wasn’t able to inspire the Eagles to beat the lowly-rated teams as they drew 1-1 in the respective games. Following the two successive draws, the Super Eagles are currently ranked third in Group C, two points behind Rwanda, who upset South Africa on Thursday, November 21.

item.title: Moto katika mbuga ya Tsavo umechangia kudorora kwa utalii
item.description: Aliyekuwa Gavana wa Taita Taveta John Mruttu amesema moto wa mara kwa mara unaoteketeza mbuga ya Tsavo Magharibi umeathiri pakubwa utalii katika sehemu hiyo. Aliongeza kusema kwamba eneo hilo linalopakana na Ziwa Jipe na Tanzania lina vivutio vya aina yake kwa utalii hasa Ziwa Jipe. Habari Nyingine: Wakenya wamsuta Uhuru baada ya kukashifu mapinduzi ya kijeshi Mali "Hamna eneo katika nchi hii linayoweza kulinganishwa na Ziwa Jipe. Kuna mamba, viboko, na samaki wanaovuliwa na wavuvi.

item.title: Avneet Kaur - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress known for her television debut playing Jhilmil in the soap opera Meri Maa. She has since made her film debut in the 2014 movie Mardaani and gained popularity portraying the lead character of Khushi in Hamari Sister Didi. Before Fame She first rose to fame in 2010 as a finalist in the dance competition series Dance India Dance Li'l Masters. She followed shortly after in the spinoff dance competition series, Dance Ke Superstars.

item.title: FG Finally Suspends Proposed Telecoms Tax
item.description: The Muhammadu Buhari-led Government has suspended the proposed tax on telecommunication services. Naija News reports that the Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Isa Pantami, made this known on Monday in Abuja. Speaking at the inaugural meeting of the Presidential Committee on Excise Duty for the Digital Economy Sector, Pantami said the telecommunications sector is already overburdened by excessive and multiple taxations. FG Announces Proposed Telecoms Tax Recall that the government through the Budget Office of the Federation had earlier revealed that it would begin the implementation of its proposed excise duties on telecommunication services and beverages in 2023.

item.title: James Phelps - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Played the role of Fred Weasley in the Harry Potter films along with his twin brother Oliver. He also appeared in The Da Vinci Code and Kingdom. Before Fame He and his brother Oliver attended Little Sutton Primary School and the Arthur Terry Secondary School before being cast as the Weasley twins when they were fourteen. Trivia He portrayed the character Morris in the short film The Turn. Family Life He was born 13 minutes after his brother Oliver.

item.title: Tiny Tim - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Herbert Khaury, he was a ukulele-playing falsetto singer and musical archivist best known for his rendition of the song "Tiptoe through the Tulips." Before Fame He played under the name Tiny Tim after being booked at a club that loved shorter performers. Trivia He is famous for his appearances on The Johnny Carson Show. Family Life He married Vicki Budinger on December 17, 1969. He then married Jan Alweiss on June 26, 1984, and later Sue Gardner on August 18, 1995.

Those speakers spoke about a wide variety of issues over the course of the four-day convention. There were also quite a few speakers who had some level of wealth or influence, including Donald Trump himself, who at least claims to be quite wealthy.

item.title: Buhari Makes U-Turn On Boko Haram, Willing To Negotiate
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari, has welcomed negotiations with the dreaded Boko Haram terrorists, according to his spokesperson, Femi Adesina. This seems to be against the earlier stance of Buhari, who during his campaign promised not to negotiate with the insurgents if elected as president. “Boko Haram is not interested in peace — if they are interested in peace, how can they kill 13,000 Nigerians? "Why should they go and kill children when they are sleeping in their domitories, why should they bomb churches and Mosques and market places and motor parks.

Trivia He has starred in the films New York Minute and House of Wax, and, in 1999, he won FOX's Claim to Fame Contest, allowing him to appear on the Teen Choice Awards.

item.title: Veteran Nollywood Actor, Saint Obi Is Dead
item.description: Veteran Nollywood actor cum movie producer, Obinna Nwafor, popularly known as Saint Obi, is reportedly dead. Naija News learnt that the thespian died on Sunday, May 7, 2023, in the home of one of his siblings at 13 Metropolitan Street in Tudun Wada, Jos. According to Nigerian blogger, Moji Delano, the tragic incident is yet to be made official following the disagreement between the actor’s siblings. The corpse of the 57-year-old actor has been taken to the morgue at the Jos Uniniverty Teaching Hospital (JUTH).

Family Life He dated Mollie King of the band The Saturdays. He got married to Joey McDowall in December 2016. They had a son named Knox on October 30, 2017.

item.title: FG Denies Hiring Australian Negotiator
item.description: The Federal Government has denied hiring Dr Stephen Davis as a Boko Haram negotiator. The FG speaking through coordinator of the National Information Centre, Mike Omeri, disclosed the government’s position on the issue in Abuja on Friday, said the government has no plan of prosecuting any Nigerian for now following the allegations made by the Australian negotiator. “For now nobody has been hired by the government to negotiate on its behalf with Boko Haram.

item.title: Official Super Eagles Starting Eleven Against South Africa
item.description: As expected, Peseiro’s talismanic forward, Victor Osimhen, will lead the attack against South Africa in the 2023 AFCON semi-final clash at 6 p.m. today, February 7. Recall that the 25-year-old Napoli striker was initially a doubt for the game due to abdominal discomfort as he didn’t travel with the team from Abidjan to Ivory Coast’s second-largest city, Bouaké on Monday night. Fortunately for the Super Eagles, Osimhen who has not missed any of the five games the Nigerian side had played in the tournament was cleared fit, flew to Bouaké, and trained with the team on Tuesday.

item.title: Shakira Wearing Wedding Gown In A Stunning New Video

The second the pictures were revealed, everyone speculated on whether she has rushed off to marry Gerard Pique, Spanish football player and her boyfriend.Shakira and Gerard have a 1-year old son, Milan, and have been dating for three years.

item.description: Kisanga kilitokea katika eneo la Lanet pale ambapo bwana na bi harusi walifika kanisani wakiwa wamelewa chakari. Inasemekana kwamba siku ya harusi bwana alimshawishi bi harusi kuonja dozi kiasi ndiposa asiingie baridi mbele ya umati wa watu. Habari Nyingine: Mchekeshaji mkongwe Walter Mong'are aomboleza kifo cha Mzee Moi Kulingana na Taifa Leo, wawili hao wanadaiwa kubugia chupa kadhaa kabla ya kuandamana na msafara wao kuelekea kanisani. Ibada iliendelea vizuri hadi pale ambapo pasta aliwaagiza wasimame walishane kiapo.

item.title: Ebonyi: Umahi Suspends Commissioners, Aides
item.description: Governor David Umahi of Ebonyi State on Friday approved the dissolution of the State Executive Council with immediate effect. Naija News reports that this was made known by the Secretary to the State Government (SSG) Kenneth Ugbala after the council’s meeting. Ugbala however revealed that Umahi did not sack some key officers during the first phase of the dissolution. Those not affected include SSG, Attorney General and Commissioner for Justice, Cletus Ofoke; Commissioner for Finance, Orlando Nweze and Commissioner for Information, Uchenna Orji.

item.title: Machina Speaks On His Victory Over Lawan
item.description: Bashir Machina has commended the Federal High Court for declaring him as the authentic senatorial candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Yobe North. Recall that the court declared Machina as the authentic candidate against the Senate President, Ahmad Lawan who is seeking the same ticket under the ruling party. The court presided over by Justice Fadima Murtala Aminu on Wednesday also ordered the APC and the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) to recognise Machina as the candidate for Yobe North senatorial district.

item.description: - Maria and Consolata were fused at the heart - They planned to become teachers upon completion of university education - They were against being surgically separated and hoped to marry one husband one day - President Magufuli led in mourning the inspirational sisters The Tanzanian conjoined twins who were against being separated from each other have died. The twin sisters, Maria and Consolata passed on at Iringa Provincial Hospital today Sunday, June 3, after a protracted battle with heart complications which saw them get admitted to the hospital in December 2017 until their untimely death.

item.description: Former Senate President, Abubakar Bukola Saraki and other chieftains of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) are holding a meeting in Abuja today over the 2023 elections. Two northern state governors, Bala Mohammed of Bauchi and Aminu Tambuwal of Sokoto are present at the meeting, Naija News reports. A related meeting was held recently in Bauchi by the trio. Naija News understands that the PDP leaders’ constant meeting is not unconnected with the 2023 presidential ticket expected to be keenly contested.

item.title: Highly Anticipated 'X' Sequel 'MaXXXine' May Be Just Around the Corner
item.description: A24's 'X' sequel, 'MaXXXine,' has reportedly been sent for limited test screenings. When is the film's release date? Source: A24Fans of A24 horror movies were in for a bloody surprise when slasher X and its prequel, Pearl, both released within the same year. Director Ti West, along with starring actor Mia Goth, created and shot both films at the same time, transforming 1970s Texas into a World War I fever dream.

item.title: Uasin Gishu: Ghulamu atoka jela kukuta mke ameuza shamba lake
item.description: Jamaa mmoja kutoka mtaa mmoja wa jimbo la Uasin Gishu alipigwa na butwaa alipotoka jela na kupata mkewe aliuza kipande chake cha ardhi na kuhama. Mdaku alidokeza kwamba lofa alitupwa jela yapata miaka mitatu iliyopita baada ya kumvamia na kumuumiza mwenzake. Habari Nyingine: Maelezo kuhusu kusambaa, dalili na jinsi ya kujikinga dhidi ya COVID-19 Licha ya kwamba alihisi furaha moyoni hatimaye amepata uhuru wake na atatangamana na ndugu na jamaa zake nyumbani aliyokumbana nayo yalimvunja moyo.

item.title: Umahi's Defection From PDP A Homecoming
item.description: Governors elected on the platform of the All Progressives Congress (APC) on Friday commended Governor David Umahi for dumping the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). This was made known in a statement titled, “Progressive Reinforcement…Welcoming Chief David Nweze Umahi to the APC,” signed by the PGF Chairman and Governor of Kebbi State, Abubakar Bagudu. The APC governors stated that Governor Umahi’s defection to the ruling party was long overdue. The statement read in part, “The Progressive Governors Forum heartily welcome His Excellency, Chief David Nweze Umahi, Governor of Ebonyi State to the All Progressives Congress (APC).

item.title: What Is the Cracker Barrel Controversy? The Right Is Upset
item.description: Conservatives Are Upset Because Cracker Barrel Is Celebrating Pride MonthBy Joseph AllenPublished June 9 2023, 11:18 a.m. ET Source: Instagram/@crackerbarrelIt's not exactly a bastion of woke liberalism, but Cracker Barrel has made some efforts to improve its diversity and inclusion in recent years. Now, amid a wave of anger from right-wing agitators over everything from hiring a diversity officer to celebrating Pride, the restaurant chain appears to be the latest victim.

The final season of Jane the Virgin will be airing this March, and fans are sad to watch the characters and storylines they’ve become so invested in, hit their final mark.

Now, she's back in another big one as co-host of the 2021 Golden Globes. She and Amy Poehler teamed up for the job in 2015, but with everyone watching from home this year, the duo has to go the extra mile to make sure everyone feels like a part of the experience.

item.title: Faeglow - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Roblox video creator who specializes in the Roblox mini-game Bloxburg. She has posted a number of speedbuilds, roleplays, skits and more for her more than 260,000 subscribers. item.title: I Was Hospitalised Various Times Over Piracy Of 'Malaika'
item.description: Nollywood actress, Toyin Abraham has said that the piracy of her movie, Malaika resulted in her having panic attacks and being hospitalised at various times. The thespian stated this on Tuesday while addressing newsmen in Lagos. Abraham statement is coming amidst police reports that five suspects have been apprehended in relation to the pirated movie which, according to the actress, gulped N500 million in production. Abraham, who said she has taken up the fight against pirates, commended the police for matching their words with action by arresting the suspects.

Before Fame Her first foray into the entertainment industry was in 2001 when she was a member of the short-lived girl band Orchid. Trivia In 2010, she appeared as the recurring character Louise in the MTV series Warren the Ape.

item.title: I Have Never Seen My Mother Cry
item.description: Priscilla Ojo, daughter of Nollywood actress, Iyabo Ojo has said that she has never been depressed before. The influencer attributed this to the ‘strong woman virtue’ in her family. She explained that she learnt how to be strong from her mother, adding that she has never seen Iyabo Ojo cry. Ojo disclosed this during a chat with media personality Jermaine. She explained that the most important lesson her mother has taught her is how to be strong.

item.title: We Have Deployed NYSC Members, Consultants To Replace Striking Doctors
item.description: The Minister of Health, Osagie Ehanire has revealed that the government has mobilized corps members and consultants to manage hospitals as resident doctors continue their strike action. Speaking on Thursday, Ehanire noted that the government is aware of the impact created by the striking doctors on the health facilities but has deployed replacements to mitigate the impact. The Minister insisted that it is wrong for the medical doctors to embark on strike given the sensitive nature of their duties and the impact it can have on the citizens.

item.title: Wike, Makinde, Ortom, Others Storm London For Crucial Meeting
item.description: The five aggrieved Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) governors led by Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike are set to meet in London, United Kingdom, today (Thursday) for a crucial meeting. Naija News recalls that Wike, Governors Seyi Makinde (Oyo), Okezie Ikpeazu (Abia), Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi (Enugu) and Samuel Ortom (Benue), former governor Ayo Fayose, Chief Olabode George and many others had pulled out of the PDP Presidential Campaign Council, demanding the removal or resignation of the National Chairman of the party, Iyorchia Ayu.

item.title: Casper Van Dien - Age, Family, Bio

Before Fame He had an uncredited role in the 1984 film Revenge of the Nerds. He eventually received an acting credit six years later for his appearance in the TV movie Menu for Murder. item.title: Ngige Orders Seven Months Payment Of Medical Lecturers At Usmanu Dan Fodiyo University
item.description: Fresh information has emerged that the Minister of Labour and Employment, Chris Ngige has ordered the payment of seven months’ salaries of medical lecturers at the Usmanu Dan Fodiyo University, Sokoto (UDUS). Naija News reports that the branch chairman of the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) of the university Dr M.N Al-Mustapha, who disclosed this, said he got the information that a segment of academic staff in the College of Health Sciences had been paid a backlog of seven months of their withheld salary (March to September).

item.description: Why is the SoundCloud icon black now instead of orange? The internet is reacting poorly to the color change for the familiar icon. From their earliest days of launch to becoming widely-used staples of people's social media consumption, many of our favorite apps have adopted new looks or a minimalist aesthetic in order to appear edgier and more appealing to certain audiences.

item.description: Some chieftains of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP led by Rivers State Governor Nyesom Wike, on Wednesday, stormed the Plateau State High Court sitting in Jos. item.title: 'I Will Always Cherish The Memories We Made Together'
item.description: Ozioma, the wife of the late gospel singer, Sammie Okposo, has taken to social media to mark the first year of remembrance of her husband’s demise. Naija News recalls that Okposo died suddenly on the 25th of November 2022 and was buried a month later in the Lekki area of Lagos State. Taking to her Instagram page on Saturday, Ozioma shared a photo of her husband to eulogise him, stating she would always celebrate and cherish the memories they had together.

item.title: Will Post-Apocalyptic Thriller Series 'Snowpiercer' Get a Season 4?
item.description: Class-Conflict Thriller 'Snowpiercer' Tells a Dystopian Tale — Will There Be a Season 4?By Bianca PiazzaPublished March 29 2022, 9:47 a.m. ET Source: TNTIt's the end of the world as we know it. Forget global warming — TNT's dystopian thriller series Snowpiercer takes place in a world plagued by global freezing. With temperatures reaching -119 degrees Celsius being the norm, the post-apocalyptic series follows the world's last remaining humans as they struggle to survive on an enormous train that infinitely circles the globe.

item.title: December 16 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Jupiter is the planetary ruler of your sign, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the Sagittarius sign, you also receive a strong dose of the Sun's mystical power. Being the planet of expansion, Jupiter's influence ties into your adventurous and knowledge-driven personality. Likewise, the Sun's influence is reflected in your gifts of individuality, willpower and inspiration. Your unique planetary combination makes you far more of a risk taker than other Sagittarius Decans.

item.title: Man City Beat Man United 0-2 At Home

She mentioned this during a conversation with Laycon, while pleading with him to help her fold her clothes. However, Laycon who turned down her request, said he won’t help her fold the clothes because he is not in the habit of touching a lady’s pants unless he is taking them off. In her words, “Then I can’t touch your clothes, the only time I touch pant is when I’m taking it off”

item.title: Angola Coach, Pedro Goncalves Gives Reasons For Losing To Nigeria
item.description: Angola coach, Pedro Goncalves, believes his team didn’t enjoy the kind of privileges the Super Eagles of Nigeria have been enjoying in the 2023 AFCON which was why his team lost to them. Pedro Goncalves who has been in charge of the Angola national team since 2019 proved that he had a compact team at the 2023 AFCON by leading the lowly-rated side to record three wins and one draw before they met Nigeria in the quarter-finals of the tournament on Friday, February 2.

Did that seriously just happen on Episode 1 of And Just Like That? Did the creators kill one-half of Sex and the City's most iconic on-and-off couples? item.title: Your Govt Is Out Of Control, Filled With Fraud And Corruption
item.description: Former Kogi West Senator, Dino Melaye has called out the administration of President Muhammadu Buhari, describing it as an over-bloated government full of fraud and corruption. Melaye made the fresh allegation in a post on his Twitter page on Friday. Apart from corruption, the former lawmaker also accused the present administration of failures to deliver on promises, incompetence, and abuse of power among other things. Melaye, a known critic of the Buhari administration wrote: “This government is so out of control.

As we now rewatch and binge Wednesday over and over again, searching for the series’ easter eggs and hidden details, one thing fans are quickly picking up on is a potential romance between Wednesday Addams (Jenna Ortega) and Enid Sinclair (Emma Myers). This read of the Netflix series has become so popular that #Wenclair is even trending as their possible couple name.

item.title: Ghana Inauguration: Joy as Akufo-Addo is sworn in as 5th president (photos)
item.description: - The people of Ghana have turned out en masse for the inauguration of new president Nana Akufo-Addo - The inauguaration holding Saturday, January 7, is attended by several heads of state - Nigerian president, Muhammadu Buhari is in attendance at the inauguration It is indeed a time of joy as thousands of people have converged at the Independence Square in Accra to witness the momentous swearing-in of Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo as the fifth President of the Fourth Republic.

item.title: Kandi Burruss Said Theres a Lot of Negativity Ahead for Her at the RHOA Reunion
item.description: Kandi Burruss shared some of the drama ahead in the ‘Real Housewives of Atlanta’ Season 15 reunion amid rumors that the season might be her last. Source: BravoAfter a tumultuous season, The Real Housewives of Atlanta will air its Season 15 finale on Sunday, Aug. 27, 2023. Most Housewives fans know by now that with a season’s end comes the showdown (at least for the season): The annual reunion hosted by no other than Andy Cohen.

item.title: Special Forces Soldiers, Policemen, DSS Operatives Storm Abuja, Arrest Scores Of Suspects
item.description: The Muhammadu Buhari-led Federal Government has increased security in the Federal Capital Territory after the terror alerts issued by the United States and the United Kingdom. The US Embassy had in a statement last Sunday announced that it would offer reduced services until further notice and urged American citizens to avoid non-essential movements. The statement added that possible targets by the terrorists may include government buildings, places of worship, schools, markets, shopping malls, hotels, bars, restaurants, athletic gatherings, transport terminals, law enforcement facilities, and international organizations.

item.title: Trolling YouTubers Are Finding Their Accounts Terminated Without Warning
item.description: Different trolling accounts are finding that their YouTube accounts were terminated without warning. Here’s why XboxAddictionz channel was deleted. Source: YouTubeYouTube has never been good at handling controversies or sudden changes in their policies. If you saw the dumpster fire that was adpocolypse, then you know the platform hasn't really gotten better since. Recently, YouTube has been suspending accounts it claims are violating the platform's community guidelines. Users like XboxAddictionz find their channel has been deleted without warning, and these users want to know why.

item.title: Ulijua kuwa maua ya ndizi ni chakula kitamu? Fahamu jinsi ya kukitayarisha
item.description: Wengi hujua tu ndizi huliwa zikiwa mbicho au mbivu lakini hawafahamu kuwa maua yake hupikwa na kuliwa kama chakula kitamu sana kando na kuwa na virutubishi muhimu vya kuunufaisha mwili. Habari Nyingine: Wanafunzi wawili wa kike wakamatwa wakivuta bangi na kushiriki ngono na wanaume 5, Nairobi (picha) Uchunguzi wa kisayansi umeonyesha kuwa chakula cha maua hayo husaidia mwili kusawazisha hedhi kwa wanawake ambao wanaweza kuwa siku zao hubadilika kila mwezi. Kando na hedhi, chakula hicho husaidia kuongeza chembe chembe za damu kuzuia magonjwa mbali mbali ukiwemo wa Anaemia.

item.title: Joe Igbokwe Mocks Arrested IPOB Leader, Nnamdi Kanu
item.description: The Special Adviser to Lagos Governor on Drainage and Water Resources, Joe Igbokwe has gone spiritual in his reaction to the arrest of IPOB leader, Nnamdi Kanu. Igbokwe who took to his social media account, shared pictures of himself worshipping God over the arrest of Kanu. As earlier reported by Naija News, the federal government of Nigeria has confirmed the arrest of the leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra, IPOB, Nnamdi Kanu.

item.title: Filmmaker Mary Njoku Gets Emotional as Her Children Start School after 2 Years of Being at Home
item.description: Nigerian actress Mary Njoku is in a happy mood after her children concluded their homeschooling after two yearsSharing a picture of the kids with her followers on Instagram, Njoku said the past two years have been uneasy for her, as she spent no less than 20 hours each day, dealing with themThe thespian, who expressed satisfaction that her working hours at home have now been reduced, said she’s missing them alreadyNollywood actress and filmmaker, Mary Njoku, has gone emotional in her latest post on Instagram.

item.title: JUST IN: Muazu Resigns, Secondus Takes Over As Chairman
item.description: Reports reaching us indicate that Adamu Mu’azu, the national chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has resigned as the party's chairman. This comes after several bigwigs of the party blamed him for President Goodluck Jonathan’s defeat at the just concluded presidential poll and demanded his resignation. In a report published by This day, his resignation took effect immediately. READ ALSO: Fani-Kayode Tacitly Slams Metuh, Lauds APC Media Team However, a source, who spoke with Premium Times, revealed that the embattled chairman was advised by his close friends and associates to resign, at a meeting held on Tuesday night in Abuja.

item.title: Anthony Joshua Parties With Injured Erling Haaland In Dubai
item.description: Nigerian-born British heavyweight boxer, Anthony Joshua celebrated New Year’s Eve in style in Dubai alongside Manchester City forward, Erling Haaland. Recall that since December 6, Erling Haaland has been battling to recover from a foot injury after recording an unprecedented debut season at Manchester City last season. Interestingly, the prolonged injury layoff didn’t prevent him from partying into the new year alongside Anthony Joshua who had a superb 2023 in terms of winning boxing bouts.

item.title: Doyin Okupe, 10 Others Sacked By Labour Party
item.description: The Director-General of the Labour party’s Presidential Campaign Council, Doyin Okupe has been sacked by the Ogun State chapter of Labour Party over non payment of membership dues. Okupe, together with 10 others, was expelled from the party for violating its constitution. Briefing newsmen on Thursday in Abeokuta, the Chairman of Labour Party in Ogun State, Michael Ashade, and the party’s secretary, Feyisola Michael, alleged that Okupe and others have in the last six months failed to pay their membership dues, despite several notifications.

item.title: Akothee kumfadhili miaka 4 mwanafunzi mwerevu aliyekuwa hana karo ya kujiunga na Maranda
item.description: Msanii mwenye utata Kenya kwa jina Akothee hatimaye ametimiza ahadi yake ya kumsaidia mwanafunzi mwerevu aliyepata alama za juu katika Mitihani ya Kitaifa ya Shule ya Msingi (KCPE) mwaka jana. Mama huyo wa watoto watano, kwa msaada wa Wakenya wengine alifanikiwa kumwezesha Gabriel Miseda Ogweno kujiunga na shule ya Upili ya Maranda High. Ogweno aliyesomea shule ya Msingi ya Imbaruetin Community Complex iliyoko kijiji cha Namelok, Kajiado Kusini, aliyepata maksi 440 katika mtihani wa kitaifa wa KCPE.

item.title: Alfred Mutua Says DP William Ruto Needs to Be Protected as President in Waiting
item.description: According to Governor Alfred Mutua, DP William Ruto is the second most powerful personality in the country and thus needs top-notch securityHe says Ruto is the president in waiting should anything befall the president, and that is why he should be heavily guardedHowever, Mutua poked holes at the extend of the security enjoyed by the deputy president after it emerged a total of 257 officers have been assigned to guard him and his propertiesMachakos Governor Alfred Mutua has somehow come to the defence of Deputy President William Ruto over the latter's security detail that has lately raised eyebrows.

item.title: ASUU Speaks On Ending Strike, Negotiating With FG
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari-led government has been accused by the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) of showing levity in its negotiation with its members. The President of ASUU, Emmanuel Osodeke in an interview with Vanguard noted that ending the industrial action is dependent on the readiness of the Federal Government He stated that the strike will end if the Federal Government take the issue with importance and do the needful.

item.title: Robin Zlotnick - Distractify
item.description: Chief Content and Copy EditorLocation: New York City, New York, United StatesEducation: Emerson CollegeContact us by Email Robin Zlotnick is a writer and editor who has worked in digital publishing for many years. Before joining 'Distractify' full-time in 2020, Robin worked in the editorial departments of companies like Guff and Brainjolt Media. There, she wrote fun listicles and quizzes, jumped on breaking celebrity news stories, and copyedited her heart out. A grammar nerd through and through, Robin relishes any opportunity to roll up her sleeves and get down and dirty with syntax, style guides, and yes, Oxford commas.

Unfortunately, every now and again, the messaging app doesn’t work perfectly, and that can definitely be super frustrating for users. Recently, a bunch of Snapchatters noticed that their messages were stuck on “pending” and were accompanied by a gray send arrow — but what does that mean, exactly?

item.title: Tinubu Receives Nigeria Football Token Ahead Of Super Eagles Match
item.description: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, on Saturday in France, received a Nigeria Football token. The Special Adviser to the President on Media and Publicity, Ajuri Ngelale, made this known in a statement on Saturday. Ngelale said the president received the token ahead of the Super Eagles’ Round of 16 clash against Cameroon at the African Cup of Nations (AF CON)  today. The presidential spokesman added that President Tinubu looks forward to a quality showing from the Super Eagles.

item.title: 2015 for Jonathan is not negotiable, Clark, South-south elders, Chiefs, leaders
item.description: Ahead of 2015 Presidential election, former Federal Commissioner for Information and Ijaw leader, Chief Edwin Clark yesterday led other South South leaders, Elders, Chiefs to declare that other parts of the country must wait after the incumbent as 2015 for Jonathan was not negotiable. Meanwhile, Chief Clark yesterday renewed his attack on  former President Olusegun Obasanjo, saying the former President, described as one of the richest men in Nigeria today was only having N20, 000 in his account when he was released from Yola prison to contest the 1999 general elections, adding that the former Chairman, Board of Trustees, BoT was pretending to be innocent today.

item.title: How Buhari Reacted When I Told Him About Tinubus Emi Lokan Speech
item.description: A former media aide to ex-President Muhammadu Buhari, Femi Adesina, has shared an intriguing episode involving Buhari’s reaction to President Bola Tinubu’s notable ‘emi lokan’ speech. In his narrative, Adesina recalls the moment he informed Buhari about Tinubu’s remarks in June 2022, during a meeting with All Progressives Congress (APC) delegates in Ogun. The ‘emi lokan’ phrase, which translates to “it is my turn” in Yoruba, gained significant attention when Tinubu, then a presidential aspirant, asserted that Buhari would not have won the 2015 presidential election without his support.

Family Life He was married to Karen Lee Bright in 1990, but the couple divorced in 1991. He then married Sonia Rodriguez in 1992.

item.title: President Buhari To Hold Nationwide Broadcast
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari will address the country in a nationwide broadcast to mark the 2021 Independence Day celebration. Naija News reports that Nigeria’s Independence Day is celebrated every October 1st to mark our independence from colonial rule under the British government. In a statement to newsmen on Thursday, the broadcast is part of activities marking the 61st Independence Anniversary of the country. President Buhari will broadcast to the nation on Friday, October 1, 2021 at 7am.

item.title: Ajabu: Wapenzi wakamatwa wakilishana uroda makuburini, Langata
item.description: - Wapenzi wawili waliwaacha wengi kinywa wazi baada ya kupatikana wakilishana uroda katika eneo la makaburini ya umma ya Langata, Nairobi - Wawili hao waliitandika leso na kuanza kupapasana bila kujali waliokuwa wakipita katika eneo hilo Lilikuwa ni jambo la kuajabia mno huku wapenzi wawili wakipatikana wakifanya tendo la ndoa katika eneo la makaburi ya umma ya Langata, Nairobi Kwa mujibi gazeti ya Taifa Leo, wawili hao waliitandika leso humo na kuanza kupapasana bila kujali wapiti njia.

item.title: April 19 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Mars is the planetary ruler of your sign, but as you were born in the third Decan, or part, of the sign, you are also subject to the planetary influence of Jupiter. Mars, being the planet of assertiveness, is linked to your aggressive and vigorous personality, but it is the power of Jupiter that links to your generous, optimistic and truth-seeking qualities. Your unique combination of planetary power makes you the most knowledge-driven of all the Aries Decans.

item.title: Dino Melaye Reveals The Most Difficult Presidential Candidate To Campaign For
item.description: The former lawmaker representing Kogi West senatorial district, Dino Melaye on Friday revealed the most difficult presidential candidate to sell in 2023. According to Melaye, the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu,  is the most difficult presidential candidate to campaign for in the forthcoming election. Dino noted that the failure of the ruling party and the current administration marketed the candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar.

item.title: Emeka Rollas Re-elected As AGN President
item.description: The Actors Guild of Nigeria (AGN) has conducted a fresh election ushering in Ejezie Emeka Rollas for a second tenure as its National President for the next three years. According to reports, the new leadership was re-elected on Tuesday at the end of the 2022 Nollywood Actor Summit of the guild held in Benin City, Edo. Emeka polled 115 affirmative votes from about 120 delegates from 20 states against four nays to retain his position just as Abubakar Yakubu Salisu got 120 ‘yes’ votes against one nay vote to return as National Secretary.

item.title: Girl Makes Paper Shoes After Hers Were Stolen at School
item.description: This Girl Made Paper Sandals After Her Shoes Were Stolen at SchoolBy Jennifer FarringtonSep. 14 2023, Published 1:40 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@poxndtxwnSchool dynamics may have changed thanks to the COVID-19 pandemic but one thing that has remained consistent is adolescent behavior. It’s immature, unpredictable, and sometimes a bit cruel. While I’ve had my fair share of mean girl moments (me being the victim) at school, I never had my shoes stolen.

item.title: Gov Okorocha implicated in human trafficking mess
item.description: - Governor allegedly collaborated with Kosovo, Turkey, Croatia and other countries - NMA believes the building of 27 new general hospitals in the state are evidences - Governor's aide says case is old and is being investigated by the DSS Governor Rochas Okorocha of Imo state has been accused of allegedly collaborating with Kosovo, Turkey, Croatia and other countries to carry out human organs trafficking. This accusation was made by the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA), through the chairman of the Private and General Medical Practitioners in the state, Dr Philip Njemanze, Nigerian Pilot reports.

item.title: How Much Is College Hunks Hauling Junk Worth Today? Let's Find Out
item.description: There sure is a lot of garbage in the world, someone has to haul it. So, how much is College Hunks Hauling Junk Worth today? You'd be surprised. If you've ever moved, you know how excruciatingly painful the entire process is. First you decide what to keep and what to get rid of. Then you have to meticulously pack up the rest of your worldly belongings. And of course, there is the Herculean task of moving your furniture.

item.title: It Is punishable By Law
item.description: Amid the rise in cases of kidnapping in the country, the Nigeria Police Force has warned that self-kidnapping is a criminal action punishable by law Naija News reports that the police, in a statement released on Tuesday, expressed concerns about the growing trend of self-kidnapping in the country. The spokesperson of the Nigeria Police Force, Olumuyiwa Adejobi, cautioned against the trend saying that there are legal consequences tied to the action.

item.title: Kiraithe sacked as former Operation Linda Nchi spokesman takes over as government spokesman
item.description: Government spokesperson Eric Kiraithe has been sacked and his position taken up by former Operation Linda Nchi spokesman Cyrus Oguna. In a statement signed by ICT Cabinet Secretary Joe Mucheru, the move takes effect immediately as the government continues to streamline its communication structure. READ ALSO: MP Gladys Shollei says CS Magoha partly to blame for huge number of satellite campuses READ ALSO: Uasin Gishu tycoon Buzeki endorses demonstrations to flush out corrupt leaders According to the press release by the ministry dated Tuesday, May 7, the new appointee will be charged with the responsibility of overseeing all government communication channels under the ministry of ICT.

item.title: Knocks As BBNaija's Chichi Charges N20m For Brand Influencing
item.description: Former housemate of the Big Brother Naija season 7 ‘Level Up’ show Chinenyenwa Desire Okoebor, better known asChichi has come under criticism after she announced what she charges for influencing. This is coming after the reality star via her Instagram handle shared her charges and terms for partnership with brands interested in her influencing. In the memo shared, the Edo-born revealed that for a one-year-brand influencing contract, she will be charging N20 million, while N12 million will be charged for 6 months.

item.title: Mom Leaves Daughters Friend at Airport Alone at 4AM
item.description: Woman Calls Out Friend’s Mom for Leaving Her Stranded at Airport at 4 AM After Nightmare TripBy Mustafa GatollariPublished July 22 2022, 12:56 p.m. ET Source: MumsnetIn the Islamic tradition, it's said that there are three experiences that show you the true character of an individual—going to war with them by your side, doing business with them, and traveling with them. Hopefully, none of us will have to experience the first one, and if you've done the second and it hasn't turned out well, then we're sorry for that.

item.title: Nadia Mukami: 10 cutest photos of the Kenyan singer-songwriter
item.description: Nadia Mukami is one of the most talented female singers in Kenya. She is not only vocally gifted, but her songwriting skills are also at another level. Her love songs have made it to the favourite playlists of East African fans and those from countries that do not speak Swahili, such as Nigeria. It is impossible not to love this musical goddess who also happens to be the epitome of beauty.

item.title: Niger President, Mohamed Bazoum Detained By Guards'
item.description: Members of the Presidential Guard have detained the President of Niger, Mohamed Bazoum. A source close to Bazoum on Wednesday disclosed that the decision of the guard is coming on the heels of the ‘ultimatum’ given to the President by the army. Naija News had earlier reported that the guard sealed off access to the president’s residence and offices. There are indications that there was no special deployment of military or gunfire incidents at the reported spots, but Bazoum’s official home and offices in the presidential complex in Niamey were sealed off on Wednesday morning.

item.title: President Obama's Reacts To The Boston Marathon Bombing:
item.description: Good afternoon, everybody. Earlier today I was briefed by my homeland security team on the events in Boston. We're continuing to monitor and respond to the situation as it unfolds and I've directed the full resources of the Federal Government to help State and local authorities protect our people, increase security around the United States as necessary and investigate what happened. The American people will say a prayer for Boston tonight and Michelle and I send our deepest thoughts and prayers to the families of the victims in the wake of this senseless loss.

item.title: Student loans in Kenya - Tuko.co.ke
item.description: Student loans in Kenya are getting more and more attention as time goes by. Gone are the days when one could land a job without a degree to back it up. Competition for jobs is becoming high as more people being qualified for the job. That is why many people who may not afford the costly university education are considering getting an education loan in Kenya. This allows the student to study peacefully throughout the four years in college on loan and to pay off the debt acquired in small chucks.

item.title: The Jon Miller Controversy From the 2020 Oscars: A Complete Breakdown
item.description: Here's Why Jon Miller Is Getting Hate After the 2020 OscarsBy Lizzy RosenbergUpdated Feb. 10 2020, 12:15 p.m. ET Source: GettyAlmost anyone who watched the 2020 Oscar Awards in its entirety knows that Parasite basically swept the entire show. And while most would agree the South Korean film director, Bong Joon-ho, deserved each and every one of the four awards he received, it appears that one person wasn't on board... namely, BlazeTV's Jon Miller.

item.title: Vee Reveals What Laycon Did For Her
item.description: A housemate in the Big Brother Naija House, ‘Lockdown Edition’, Vee, on Friday disclosed the things the winner of the reality show, Laycon did for her in the house. The fourth runner-up in the show was Laycon’s closest friend in the house and was there to discuss urgent issues with him when he was turned down by Erica. Vee in her statement noted that Laycon changed her mind about a lot of thigs, she added that her time with the reality show winner was a blessing.

item.title: What Was 'Dawson's Creek' Writer Heidi Ferrer's Cause of Death?
item.description: Fans Mourn the Loss of Television Writer Heidi Ferrer, Who Has Died at Age 50By Anna GarrisonPublished June 18 2021, 2:15 p.m. ET Source: InstagramIn recent sad news for the entertainment community, television writer Heidi Ferrer, known for her work on Dawson's Creek and Wasteland, died on May 26, 2021. The writer had been struggling against long-term coronavirus complications after she contracted the virus in April 2020. Here's everything we know about her cause of death.

item.title: Yuya - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Spanish language YouTube vlogging icon who ranks as one of the most subscribed to personalities in all of YouTube. She posts about all things beauty on her self-titled channel, which has earned over 24 million subscribers. She has also worked as one of the promotional voices for the United Nations and was featured on their Instagram page.  Before Fame She studied ballet and theater as a child. She created her first YouTube account when she was 16 after winning a makeup contest.
